/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of beige and brown, are adorned with balconies and awnings, adding character to the cityscape. The trees, stripped of their leaves, stand bare against the clear blue sky, hinting at the winter season. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the textures of the buildings and trees.
